interlinear-text.item: MSK a waxt ki mawsimi baor [3]

phrase.item: When it's springtime, there are flowers and different kinds of grass around.
You are always in my mind.
Whenever you are not in this village,
Without you I am not completely alive
Without you I have neither desire nor dream.
In the city I will be your guest,
The flower of the city is beautiful.
Sadbarg (name of a flower) has been cold flower ?
The source of the flower has meaning.
The city flower has been sweet,
